name: Tangy Corn Relish

ingredients.name: finely diced sweet red pepper
ingredients.original_string: 1/4 cup finely diced sweet red pepper

ingredients.name: finely diced green bell pepper
ingredients.original_string: 1/4 cup finely diced green bell pepper

ingredients.name: medium-size jalapeno chili
ingredients.original_string: 1 medium-size jalapeno chili, seeds and ribs removed

ingredients.name: large green onion
ingredients.original_string: 1 large green onion, trimmed and sliced thinly (including the green)

ingredients.name: garlic cloves
ingredients.original_string: 3 garlic cloves, peeled and finely chopped

ingredients.name: fresh corn kernels and juice
ingredients.comment: cut and scraped from about 3 medium ears
ingredients.original_string: 2 1/2 cups fresh corn kernels and juice, cut and scraped from about 3 medium ears

ingredients.name: seasoned rice-wine vinegar
ingredients.original_string: 3 tablespoons seasoned rice-wine vinegar, or regular rice vinegar with a pinch of sugar

instructions: Warm olive oil in a small, heavy, non-reactive saucepan over medium heat. Add red and green peppers, jalapeno, onion and garlic. Cover, and cook, stirring once or twice, for 5 minutes. Add corn and juices, and cook, covered, until mixture has softened and thickened, about 8 minutes.
Transfer to a bowl, stir in vinegar and lime juice; let cool. Cover. Refrigerate 24 hours or up to 3 days. To serve, add cilantro.
